Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.description: Currently rust openssl is fixed to version 0.9.24 but the latest version is 0.10.11https://github.com/AxelNennker/indy-sdk/blob/master/libindy/Cargo.toml#L57Also consider using feature vendored at least for cross-compilation.Current openssl version 1.1.1 which has improvements to make compiling for Android simpler and rust openssl uses openssl version 1.1.1.https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/master/NOTES.ANDROIDSo bumping rust openssl probably helps compiling for Android.
